# textrar

https://mt-auto-minhon-mlt.ucri.jgn-x.jp/


https://mt-auto-minhon-mlt.ucri.jgn-x.jp/api/mt/transLM_ja_en/

## TexTra


The goal of pivotea is to translate texts with textra  easily.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("matutosi/textrar")
```

You can also install from CRAN:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("textrar")
```

## Example

You can use `textra()` to translate texts with textra  easily.

```{r example}
library(textrar)


```


## Citation

Toshikazu Matsumura (2024) textrar. Translate with textra. https://github.com/matutosi/textrar/
